docs.name: Hiking Boots
docs.description: These hiking boots are ready for whatever you want to throw at them! Ultra waterproof, these boots are ready for even the muddiest conditions. Super comfortable and built to last with an ultra sleek upper and reinforced toe.

docs.name: Camping Chair
docs.description: This sturdy and comfortable camping chair comes in a variety of colors. Perfect for a day out camping, taking to a game, or for just lounging around your own backyard. The chair folds up and comes with a handy carrying case for easy mobility. It also comes with two mesh cup holders for your convenience.

docs.name: Women's Fluffy Coat
docs.description: This down jacket is great for the active woman. It’s super warm and comes with a cute faux fur lined hood. Even though the coat is warm, it is still lightweight and breathable. As an added bonus, it is also water resistant.

docs.name: Lantern
docs.description: With 360 degrees of illumination, this rustic-looking lantern is just what you need on your next camping trip. With two light settings, high or low, you’re sure to have ample lighting for your next project.

docs.name: Hiking Backpack
docs.description: Designed with comfort in mind, this backpack is great for an avid hiker along with the everyday weekend outdoorsman. With ample pockets and storage, you can take along anything you need. Also comes with two straps across the body for more even weight distribution.

docs.name: Lantern
docs.description: With 360 degrees of illumination, this rustic-looking lantern is just what you need on your next camping trip. With two light settings, high or low, you’re sure to have ample lighting for your next project.

docs.name: Camping Chair
docs.description: This sturdy and comfortable camping chair comes in a variety of colors. Perfect for a day out camping, taking to a game, or for just lounging around your own backyard. The chair folds up and comes with a handy carrying case for easy mobility. It also comes with two mesh cup holders for your convenience.

docs.name: Men's Fluffy Coat
docs.description: Ultra water resistant, this coat sure to please even the most active outdoorsmen.  It delivers comfort and warmth when needed most. Stuffed with down alternative, it’s sure to keep you warm in the coldest conditions.

docs.name: Tent
docs.description: This tent is a breeze to set up and comes in a great color. The zippers for the door are reinforced to avoid accidental tears and rips. Each window is screened allowing for ample air flow during the warmer months and can be zipped up for warmth in the colder months and cooler nights.
